refnamediv.refpurpose: Transfer control at i-time when a new note is being tied onto a previously held note

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Similar to igoto but effective only during an i-time pass at which a new note is being tied onto a previously held note. (See i Statement) It does not work when a tie has not taken place. Allows an instrument to skip initialization of units according to whether a proposed tie was in fact successful. (See also tival).

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: where label is in the same instrument block and is not an expression.
